Title: Relates to exempting state owned, leased or operated on behalf of, heavy duty vehicles operating on biodiesel from the diesel emissions reduction act of 2006
Summary: Exempts state owned heavy duty vehicles or heavy duty vehicles under contract with the state operating on biodiesel from the diesel emissions reduction act of 2006; defines biodiesel.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0323, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to exempting state owned heavy duty vehicles or heavy duty vehicles under contract with the state operating on biodiesel from the diesel emissions reduction act of 2006
